title: S13 Ep139: Things Stranger than Fiction
itunes:title: Things Stranger than Fiction
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS finds light in the dark with Bill Bean as we examine Things Stranger than Fiction!

Bill Bean is an exorcist, investigator and experiencer of the darkest aspects of the paranormal. Today he stops by to share some new tales of malevolent forces.

We also discuss Aliens, Sasquatch and their place in the universe and possible origins.

Get more info on Bill and his books and work at:
www.BillBean.net

www.billbeanministries.com
